author: DistroTube
description:
Waypaper is a GUI wallpaper setter for Wayland and Xorg window managers. It works as a frontend for popular wallpaper backends like swaybg, swww, wallutils, hyprpaper, mpvpaper and feh.

REFERENCED:
► https://github.com/anufrievroman/waypaper
